page.title: Answer and Result File Information
page.introduction:
The PAWS Starter Kit creates several files.
One stores the answers you have given to the questions.
Another stores the automatically generated PC-PATR grammar file.
A third stores the automatically generated grammar write-up file.
Finally, there are many example files it creates so you can test the PC-PATR grammar. You can set these files by answering the following questions.

fileInfo.prompt: The name of the file that contains your answers is shown below. Click on the 'Browse' button to change it.
The name of the automatically generated PC-PATR grammar file is shown below. Click on the 'Browse' button to change it.
The name of the automatically generated grammar write-up file is shown below. Click on the 'Browse' button to change it.

directoryInfo.prompt: The directory where the example files are located is shown below. Click on the 'Browse' button to change it.

form.introduction: The example files are standard format files. You can set the field code to use in them.
